trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel"></xref>路由事件，以及相關附加事件和預覽事件。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: 這個委派會使用與下列附加事件。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>這個委派會使用與下列路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A> property is positive if the mouse wheel is moved forward (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is moved downward (toward the user).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>屬性是正數，如果滑鼠滾輪 （遠離使用者） 會向前移動或負數滑鼠滾輪 （朝向使用者） 會向下移動。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs.Delta%2A>
